data.title: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead (2006)
data.meta_description: When the American Chicken Bunker, a military themed fast food restaurant, builds its latest chain restaurant on the site of an ancient Native American burial ground, the displaced spirits take revenge on unsuspecting diners and transform them into chicken zombies! Now, it’s up to a dimwitted counter boy, his collegiate lesbian ex-girlfriend and a burqa-wearing fry cook to put an end to the foul feathered menace once and for all.
data.text:
At one point, an incredibly obese man shits so catastrophically he not only covers the room in liquid shit, he also sheds his fat exterior for a skinnier self. This is one of the more normal scenes from Poultrygeist.

Troma films are well known for their politically incorrect humor, but this one takes it to the next level! They manage to fit in so many offensive stereotypes and jokes it blows my mind. Every race, sexuality, and ideology they could think of, they made sure to mock. And it is hilarious. I’d either laugh at the actual jokes or laugh at how absurd they’d take it. If any thing offends you, I’d suggest watching something else.

It’s also a musical.…

as a toxie kid this seemed so bad in 2008, one of lloyds embarrassing, obsolete showoffs confused past its prime yet somehow still infected with the troma tic of ejaculating wordy, synchronized jokes that still provokes my fight or flight response, fake bmovie cringe for self-conscious silent bobs to be sneered at by apologists for the model-minority "good ones" like combat shock, def by temptation or bloodsucking freaks. i mustve spent at least a decade of saw sequels (2-7?) acting like troma - troma! - was this imperial, hegemonic institution ruling & ruining horror just so i could be a funny lil guy throwin spitballs calling em "family guy for people who know who kane hodder is" like "uhh'djaknow 'fertilize the…

If you gave 5 middle school boys 500.000$ and told them to make the edgiest, most outrageously offensive movie ever made this bis what they would come up with.

This movie contains:

3 scenes of deadly anal penetration

Shit (Like actual shit)

Adolf Hitler

Someone shitting themselves to death

Someone getting his dick Shish kebab’d

Racist stereotypes

Necrophilia

Necrobestiality

Cuck

Lloyd Kaufman’s asscheek tattoo

Antisemitism

Islamophobia

Someone fucking a cash register

Homophobia

Zombie testicle eggs (They also cause you to turn out like Frank from Hellraiser once you eat them)

Raging boner Penis Chicken monster

Old man with a mommy & pamper kink getting pampered

A man get fingered by a zombie’s finger

Numerous people laying an egg

Someone eating Breast…

"Guys... GUYS! This is not a terrorist thing and this is not a sodomy thing! This is an angry chicken Indian spirit thing! ...and if we we don't find a way to stop them we are ALL gonna have mops shoved up our butts!"

Arbie and Wendy, high school sweethearts about to be separated by Wendy's choice of college are having sex in the old Tromahawk Indian burial ground until they are chased off by a psychopath with an axe. A year later, the graveyard has been razed and a new fast food chicken restaurant is built in it's place. Arbie takes a job at the new place on it's opening day, hoping to earn a few bucks and get…
